title: Takaaki Kishida
text:
Takaaki Kishida
 


I am a PhD student in Economics at the Institute of Economics and Econometrics, GSEM, University of Geneva, Switzerland.
My research interests lie at the intersection of environmental, development, and health economics. In pursuit of generating causally identified and policy-relevant evidence, I employ a variety of data sources, including large surveys, (satellite) remote sensing, and other spatial/GIS data.

 Email: Takaaki.Kishida@unige.ch
CV | ORCID | GitHub | LinkedIn






Recent News

Publication: Deforestation and Children: Consequences for Paediatric Malaria and Educational Attainment in Indonesia (2024, Journal of Development Studies)  





Other Works

Package: {easysum} Easy-to-use (wrapper) functions for summary statistics in R
Note: About project management
Note: Replication and translation exercises
Shiny App: Interactive map of my favorite places in Switzerland

title: Flexible Regression with {fixest}
text:
1 Overview

Still under construction.
This note demonstrates flexible regression analyses and table outputs with the {fixest} package.

title: Flexible Regression with {fixest}
text:
Regression

# Reg 1

reg1 <- feols(
  wage ~ educ + age,
  df
)

reg1

OLS estimation, Dep. Var.: wage
Observations: 47,976
Standard-errors: IID 
             Estimate Std. Error  t value   Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) -1340.061  228.55571 -5.86317 4.5708e-09 ***
educ          521.960   14.33997 36.39894  < 2.2e-16 ***
age           277.909    3.72721 74.56229  < 2.2e-16 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
RMSE: 8,941.9   Adj. R2: 0.115895

reg1 |> etable()

                               reg1
Dependent Var.:                wage
                                   
Constant        -1,340.1*** (228.6)
educ               522.0*** (14.34)
age                277.9*** (3.727)
_______________ ___________________
S.E. type                       IID
Observations                 47,976
R2                          0.11593
Adj. R2                     0.11589
---
Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

# Reg 2

reg2 <- feols(
  wage ~ educ + age + black + marr | 
    countyfips + year,
  df, 
  vcov = ~countyfips + year
)

reg2

OLS estimation, Dep. Var.: wage
Observations: 47,976
Fixed-effects: countyfips: 50,  year: 3
Standard-errors: Clustered (countyfips & year) 
       Estimate Std. Error   t value  Pr(>|t|)    
educ    455.883    17.5685  25.94881 0.0014818 ** 
age     175.803    55.6531   3.15890 0.0872918 .  
black -1762.725   130.7620 -13.48041 0.0054579 ** 
marr   5510.913   473.3828  11.64156 0.0072980 ** 
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
RMSE: 8,621.1     Adj. R2: 0.177284
                Within R2: 0.175213

reg2 |> etable()

                              reg2
Dependent Var.:               wage
                                  
educ               455.9** (17.57)
age                 175.8. (55.65)
black           -1,762.7** (130.8)
marr             5,510.9** (473.4)
Fixed-Effects:  ------------------
countyfips                     Yes
year                           Yes
_______________ __________________
S.E.: Clustered   by: coun. & year
Observations                47,976
R2                         0.17823
Within R2                  0.17521
---
Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

# Combine the two tables

etable(reg1, reg2)

                               reg1               reg2
Dependent Var.:                wage               wage
                                                      
Constant        -1,340.1*** (228.6)                   
educ               522.0*** (14.34)    455.9** (17.57)
age                277.9*** (3.727)     175.8. (55.65)
black                               -1,762.7** (130.8)
marr                                 5,510.9** (473.4)
Fixed-Effects:  ------------------- ------------------
countyfips                       No                Yes
year                             No                Yes
_______________ ___________________ __________________
S.E. type                       IID   by: coun. & year
Observations                 47,976             47,976
R2                          0.11593            0.17823
Within R2                        --            0.17521
---
Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Flexible Regression with {fixest}

title: Flexible Regression with {fixest}
text:

  wage ~ educ + age,
  df

reg1
